text: Iddo Genealogies is one of the lost books of the Old Testament. It is attributed to the biblical prophet Iddo, who is said to have lived at the time of Rehoboam. This text is sometimes called The Genealogies of Iddo the Seer or The Acts of Iddo the Seer. == See also == * Books of the Bible * Lost work * Non-canonical books referenced in the Bible ==References== Category:Lost Jewish texts
title: Iddo Genealogies
